title: Banana

properties.name: description
properties.value: A banana is a yellow fruit that can be found on trees in tropical locations, such as Karamja and Ape Atoll (yard at western house of monkey child and southwestern crates in the warehouse east of magic shop). They can also be bought from Wydin's Food Store in Port Sarim, Solihib's Food Stall on Ape Atoll, or a Trader Crewmember for 5 coins. They can also be obtained by using the spell Bones to Bananas, which converts bones of all types in the caster's inventory to bananas. Eating a banana restores 2 Hitpoints.

Item ID1963

A banana is a yellow fruit that can be found on trees in tropical locations, such as Karamja and Ape Atoll (yard at western house of monkey child and southwestern crates in the warehouse east of magic shop). They can also be bought from Wydin's Food Store in Port Sarim, Solihib's Food Stall on Ape Atoll, or a Trader Crewmember for 5 coins. They can also be obtained by using the spell Bones to Bananas, which converts bones of all types in the caster's inventory to bananas. Eating a banana restores 2 Hitpoints.

A banana tree can be grown in a fruit tree patch with level 33 Farming. Players can pick six bananas at a time from these trees.

10 bananas can be placed into a box owned by the NPC Luthas on Karamja to gain 30 coins.

A single banana is required to cast the standard spellbook Ape Atoll Teleport.

During the quest Tai Bwo Wannai Trio, a banana must be sliced using a knife or other sharp sword to create a sliced banana. This is then used to create banana infused karamjan rum. Bananas can also be stuck into a bottle of Karamja rum, which plugs the neck of the bottle and creates a useless item.

Five baskets of banana (5) are required for a gardener to look after Curry trees.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • A one-time medium clue scroll can be rarely obtained (1/256 chance[1]) from feeding a monkey bananas. When this happens, a message appears in the player's chatbox saying "The monkey chews on the banana and spits out a clue!".

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 17 April 2018. (Archived from the original on 23 March 2019.) Mod Ash: "The chance is 1/256, btw."

They can also be bought from [[Wydin's Food Store]] in [[Port Sarim]], [[Solihib's Food Stall]] on [[Ape Atoll]], or a [[Trader Crewmember]] for 5 coins. They can also be obtained by using the spell [[Bones to Bananas]], which converts [[bones]] of all types in the caster's inventory to bananas. Eating a banana restores 2 [[Hitpoints]]. A banana tree can be grown in a fruit tree patch with level 33 [[Farming]]. Players can pick six bananas at a time from these trees. 10 bananas can be placed into a box owned by the NPC [[Luthas]] on [[Karamja]] to gain 30 [[coins]]. A single banana is required to cast the standard spellbook [[Ape Atoll Teleport (standard)|Ape Atoll Teleport]]. During the quest [[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]], a banana must be sliced using a [[knife]] or other sharp sword to create a [[sliced banana]]. This is then used to create [[Karamjan rum (sliced banana)|banana infused karamjan rum]]. Bananas can also be stuck into a bottle of [[Karamja rum]], which plugs the neck of the bottle and creates a [[Karamjan rum (banana)|useless item]].
